2 22Protecting Project Pulp 22Protecting Project Pulp was an "Audio Pulp Fiction Magazine" hosted by Dave Robison and Simon Hildebrandt, and produced by Fred Himebaugh. PPP was originally serialised between 2012 and 2014. 22http://ppp.requisite.link 22Podcast for Node 22Sun, 02 Jan 2022 07:40:33 GMT 22Simon Hildebrandt 22All rights reserved 2013, Simon Hildebrandt 22en 22Arts 22Simon Hildebrandt 22Protecting Project Pulp was an "Audio Pulp Fiction Magazine" hosted by Dave Robison and Simon Hildebrandt, and produced by Fred Himebaugh. PPP was originally serialised between 2012 and 2014. 22 222Simon Hildebrandt 222simonhildebrandt@gmail.com 22 22false 22 222 22 22 22
